alert.note: Alert for De Witt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:26PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central De Witt County through 300 PM CDT... At 226 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weldon, or 11 miles east of Clinton, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central De Witt County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
